Items.Name: Sistemas Tecnicos de Automatizacion, S.L.U
Items.Description: Empresa dedicada al desarrollo de sistemas automáticos e integración de equipos de control y regulación para maquinaria, procesos y sistemas industriales. La amplia experiencia adquirida en el entorno industrial, así como la calidad y fiabilidad de los equipos utilizados, permiten ofrecer nuestros clientes soluciones óptimas para cada proyecto.

Items.Name: Skala AS
Items.Description:
En unik ressurs for norsk næringsmiddelindustri: 
Landteknikk er ledende leverandør av tekniske tjenester, prosessutrustning, 
emballasje og forbruksartikler til norsk næringsmiddelindustri. Vår oppgave er 
å gjøre våre kunder enda mer konkurransedyktige. 

Internasjonal teknologi tilpasset norske fohold

Vi kombinerer et omfattende internasjonalt leverandørnettverk med betydelig 
egenkompetanse om norsk næringsmiddelindustri. Dette sikrer deg løsninger 
basert på den beste teknologien som er tilgjengelig, tilpasset norske forhold.

Fra forprosjekt til oppstart
Landteknikk tilbyr tjenester innen prosjektering, prosjektledelse og 
automatisering, og tar hånd om alt fra planlegging og prosjektering, til 
montasje og igangkjøring. Våre fagmiljøer forener kunnskap om 
næringsmiddelteknologi, automasjon og prosessteknikk. Med spesialister innen de 
fleste type næringsmiddelproduksjon, kan vi tilby bransjespesifikke løsninger.

En støttespiller i daglig drift
Vi ønsker å være en støttespiller i våre kunders daglige drift, og kan tilby et 
bredt spekter av produkter og tjenester som sikrer deg effektiv og trygg 
produksjon. Dette omfatter bla hygienesystemer og -rådgivning, ingredienser, 
laboratorieutrustning og analyseutstyr, verne- og personalutstyr. 

Hjelp til forebyggende vedlikehold
Vi kan hjelpe deg med forebyggende, dokumentert  vedlikehold og service – slik 
at du kan konsentrere deg om den daglige driften.

Items.Name: Skif-Kontrol LLC
Items.Description: Skif Control is a company specializing in engineering and design developments. We have rich experience in the field of process control automation. The company's specialists carry out work on the design, supply, development and installation of software, installation, commissioning and maintenance of APCS systems. We never assume unfulfillable obligations, everything that we promise, we do and are responsible for full compliance with the original requirements. Innovation in approaches, reliability and high quality are fundamental things in the work of Skif Control.

Items.Name: Solstice
Items.Description:
La création du groupe remonte à juin 2009. Notre activité principale était l’analyse environnementale au travers de laquelle nous vous proposions des solutions pour la mesure des émissions de combustion.
Afin de structurer notre croissance et de compléter notre offre, nous avons repris la société Monox Instrumentation en 2016. Cela nous a permis de vous offrir des solutions complémentaires dans les domaines de l’automation et de l’instrumentation.
En 2019, nous avons finalisé notre offre en reprenant la société Brema Système. Cette société nous permet de vous présenter des solutions dans les domaines de la GTB/GTC et le contrôle d’accès.
Ainsi, la volonté du groupe est de fournir des solutions adaptées aux besoins de nos clients, à travers des partenariats forts avec des marques leaders dans chacun de ces domaines d’activité.
Ces solutions ont pour but d’exploiter les savoir-faire historiques de nos sociétés – à savoir le contrôle et l’acquisition de données - pour vous proposer des voies pour les valoriser (traçabilité, optimisation énergétique, traitement spécifique,…). En cela, nous vous aidons à mieux produire et à réduire vos consommations en vue de contribuer à l’amélioration de notre environnement.
 Enfin, conscients de l’importance de pouvoir vous proposer un service de proximité, le groupe se développe localement : Paris Saclay, Arras, Lyon et Metz.


Solstice is established since June 2009 and focus its activity for the French market.
At the beginning, Solstice was specialized in the environmental emission monitoring and combustion optimization. This is still its main activity and represents a turnover of 3.1 M€ in 2019, service included. Solstice provides solutions including cabinet, analyzers, gas conditioning and emission software (developed internally). In the area of boiler gaz monitoring, Solstice is today one of the 3 most significant players in France, along with Envea and Fuji. As the respective number are unknown to us, we can’t be more precise on our real ranking.
In 2016, Solutions Solstice group was founded following the taking over of Monox Instrumentation company. This was a major development as it provided new fields of development: Automation software and instrumentation. Furthermore, it allowed to increase significantly our activity in the north of France (Monox is based in Arras).
In 2019, Brema systeme was taken over. This allowed the group to present to our customer an offer in building automation. This activity is very complementary to our process automation one and will allow to go further in our vision to provide global solutions to our customers.
At the end of 2019, the total group turnover was more than 5.5 M€.

Items.Description: Since 1984, SP Automation & Robotics have been providing truly bespoke automation machines to a diverse range of industries in the UK. We have served a wide range of industries from medical device and pharmaceutical, to packaging, food and drink, plastics, electronics and automotive. As system integrators, the extensive portfolio of solutions has overcome hurdles that have been faced by our clients and have included assembly, testing, packaging, filling and labeling to name but a few. Our full in-house expertise allows us to maintain full control of our projects, from the initial concept, through to manufacture and build prior to commissioning, training and after-sales support worldwide. Items.Name: SpiraTec AG
Items.Description:
SpiraTec AG 

Offering a comprehensive service portfolio ranging from consulting services via engineering, application development and implementation through to the commissioning of production plants and subsequent operational support and optimisation, SpiraTec guarantees the success of national and international projects through fully integrated interface-optimized one-stop solutions. 

Interdisciplinary Engineering Services Provider - Industrial Engineering

SpiraTec Industrial Engineering specializes in industrial IT and industrial automation engineering complemented by process, piping und civil engineering services. Uniting these capabilities under a single roof, SpiraTec is a truly interdisciplinary engineering company and the premier address for integrated solutions including current digitalization initiatives (digital plant solutions).

System and Solution Provider - Industrial Solutions

SpiraTec Industrial Solutions offers a complete range of expertise in system integration and production-related IT solutions for manufacturing operations management, boasting a strong track record in the implementation of customized and forward-looking technologies aligned to the Industry 4.0 philosophy.

Based on innovative services for process and discrete automation, SpiraTec Solutions develops integrated process control solutions for renowned global customers in the (bio)pharmaceutical, chemical and petrochemical industries.

Items.Name: Spit Electrical Mechanics B.V.
Items.Description:
SPIT elektromechanica
Who we are, and why
SPIT is an engineering services company offering industrial clients electrical 
and mechanical solutions. We set out to help our customers find the most 
cost-efficient and efficient use of their automated production means, and 
provide them with the levels of service that they require. 

Our strengths
Our most important strengths are:
• Flexibility 
• Reliability 
• Availability 
• Competence 
• Knowledge 
• Service provider 
• Consideration 
• Professional approach
Strengthening our service
By establishing a collaborative partnership with our employees,. suppliers and 
service partners, we will always try to strengthen our service. We will support 
them with a perfect mix of technology and personal service. We understand that 
in the end people buy from people in our business and that teamwork will 
eventually lead to sustainable growth. 

Our dedication to provide the best
We want to be recognized as a company that reaches the highest standards, and 
that dedicates quality and excellence to all our transactions:
• with our clients, by providing them the best; 
• with our colleagues, by rewarding them and developing their individual skills 
and talents; 
• with our service partners, by being open, honest, loyal and reliable; 
• with our competitors, by competing fairly and cooperating with them; 
• with (local) communities, by causing no inconvenience and protecting the 
environment.
Correct leadership
SPIT's management is determined to provide you an excellent example. They want 
to earn and keep the loyalty and support of all interesting parties. This 
secures our long-term success and the future of those who are dependent on the 
company.

Items.Name: Spraytec Oy
Items.Description:
Spraytec specializes in turn-key paint shops both for powder and liquid application with high automation degree. Our people have experience in painting and running paint shops, so we do know what kind problems industry is facing in daily living.

Our experience with painting robots starts already from early 80´s. Our people has been involved with many painting robot deliveries. We are developing our skills continuously to make sure our customers gets best possible service and benefits from the investments. We are active mainly in Finland, but we have done few projects also abroad. Feel free to contact us any time when it comes to painting robots and automating your coating and painting processes.

Items.Name: Stadler + Schaaf Mess- und Regeltechnik GmbH
Items.Description:
Stadler + Schaaf provides integrated solutions for the process and 
manufacturing industries with  System 800xA and connectivity to the controller 
types Freelance and AC870P/Melody from the initial concept by way of 
engineering, installation, calibration and commissioning through to service – 
all from a single source. These services are, of course, also designed for 
plants that are subject to mandatory qualification.

Items.Description:
STAR is a business partner for Customers seeking innovative and reliable solutions to design, implement and manage complex systems through automation and modern technology.
 
Today STAR headquarter is located in Italy and manages a worldwide network of offices and Customers on the 5 Continents.
 
STAR designs and manufactures turn-key customized systems mainly for: 
 
•	automotive glass processes
•	tyres industry
•	pharmaceutical and food industries 
•	plastic and paper industries 
•	Other applications in general industry
 
Our internal resources with highly refined competencies offer solutions for the automotive glass processes, for the
Our team of over 100 engineers and technicians has extensive industrial knowledge which assures our customers receive the highest quality standards of excellence in designing, manufacturing and fully testing your equipment prior to shipment to your facility.
 
The modern industry is an ever-changing world, where the use of the latest technology allows us to excel, anticipating the customer’s wishes: in this contest innovation is playing the most important role to achieve targets.

Items.Name: SUCOM ELECTRIC Ltd
Items.Description:
旭康機電創立於民國九十五年，資本額為新台幣：壹仟萬元整。本公司是由一群在機電、自動化及工程領域服務超過二十年以上之人才所成立，不僅在各類輸/配電/自動化系統上有著豐富經驗外，在變頻器及流量計的應用更是業界之翹楚。

誠心 堅持 服務 創新為本公司所有員工努力的目標，藉由不斷的學習，除了增加新知及經驗外，更開拓了本公司的業務領域：在百貨、商場、博物館、醫院、3C產業、一般產業、污(癈)水、自來水行業均為我們能夠提供服務的範圍。

未來本公司將在三個堅持及一個目標下持續為所有的客戶服務。 
三堅持－ 堅持品質　堅持服務 　堅持誠信
一個目標－暨創造雙贏

為節能、減碳、綠化環境奉獻心力

Items.Name: Suzhou Hawk Foundry Equipment Co Ltd
Sverull ElektroDynamo AB
Items.Description:
Sverull ElektroDynamo är en ledande aktör inom industriservice och 
produktförsäljning med spetskompetens inom elektromekanik, lager, 
transmissioner, tätningar samt samt pneumatik och automation. De erbjuder hela 
kedjan från analys, projektering och produktleverans till montage, underhåll 
och reparationer. För att kunna erbjuda snabb och professionell support finns 
verksamheten på ett flertal orter i Sverige med lokala serviceverkstäder och 
lokal lagerhållning. Allt detta för att säkerställa en så effektiv och 
driftsäker produktion som möjligt för dig som kund. 

Sverull ElektroDynamo är ett framgångsrikt resultat av fusionen mellan Sverull 
och ElektroDynamo som genomfördes för att ytterligare stärka sin position på 
marknaden och erbjuda ett än mer attraktivt utbud av servicetjänster och 
industrikomponenter. Företaget förenar specialistkompetens med tekniska 
lösningar och som helhetsleverantör gör de det enkelt för dig vid inköp, 
transport och lagerhållning. Dessutom garanteras din tillgång till service, 
support och utbildning

sectors of industry, particularly in the areas of maintenance, original

Items.Name: Taller Electro-Mecanicos Peyman Sl
Items.Description:
PEYMAN S.L.U.. es una empresa de reparaciones y mantenimientos, eléctricos y electromecénicos, que presta sus servicios tanto al sector naval como al sector industrial. Nuestros servicios están orientados a cubrir los tres pilares básicos del mantenimiento, mantenimiento correctivo, mantenimiento preventivo y mantenimiento predictivo.

Efectuamos mantenimientos correctivos y preventivos en nuestras modernas instalaciones de 1000 m2 dotadas de los ultimos avances en tecnología del mantenimiento, como cubas de impregnacion al vacio, hornos industriales, maquinas equilibradoras, maquinas de fabricacion de bobinas automaticas, calienta rodamientos y plataforma de ensayos.

Para la ejecución del mantenimiento predictivo disponemos de los mas modernos equipos para la evaluacion del estado de las maquinas electricas estaticas y rotativas, asi como las instalaciones electricas industriales y navales, como camaras termográficas, analizadores de vibraciones, microohmiometros, ondas de choque, medidores de aislamiento.

Formada por un equipo de profesionales con dilatada experiencia, PEYMAN S.L.U. es capaz de ofrecer el mejor servicio técnico del mercado.

Items.Name: Tebulo Industrial Automation B.V.
Items.Description:
Tebulo Industrial Robotics is the leading and innovative specialist in high-tech robot integration. We work closely with major players in steel, aluminum and heavy industry.

With our specific expertise in R&D, engineering, assembly and commissioning, we build and maintain high-quality integrated robot applications.
 
Our expert and multidisciplinary teams pleasantly surprise you with their approach, advice, realization, service and aftersales.

With our flexible and high-tech solutions, you are assured of a significant improvement in safety and productivity. This allows you to capture and / or maintain a leading position in your market.

In addition, we offer sufficient support during the entire life cycle and we offer tailor-made solutions for automation problems for non-robot installations.

Sustainability and high delivery reliability are self-evident.

We are an ambitious and motivated employer and offer our team a challenging work environment with room for personal input and development. Our team consists exclusively of qualified and customer-oriented professionals who strive for the best result.

Taking responsibility and constantly improving is in their DNA.

Items.Name: Tech.Pa. S.p.A.
Items.Description:
TECH.PA. is focused mainly in robotics and vision system, in process and packaging applications for F&B, Home Care, Personal Care and Cosmetics markets.

The other sector are:

Programming P.L.C. and Motion Control 
Monitoring systems
Electrical panels and wiring on the machine
Customer Service

Since 2010, TECH.PA. has been authorized to design, implement and certify the 
frameworks UL cULus - File: E209624 for the North American and Canadian 
markets.
